original_text:
God has no need to examine people further,
    that they should come before him for judgment.
korean_text: 하나님은 사람을 심판하시기에 오래 생각하실 것이 없으시니

sentences.original_text: God has no need to examine people further
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 더 이상 사람들을 살펴볼 필요가 없으시며

sentences.original_text: that they should come before him for judgment
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 심판을 위해 그분 앞에 나아와야 할 것
